channel.title: I'm gonna need about tree fiddy.
channel.description:
Tree fiddyseven to be exact.
This one has been in the works for a good long while! It's been textured specifically to fit Black Mesa, and features a true world model with that shades like the view model with baked normals and all. I'm not completely satisfied with it, but I can't keep it a WIP forever. I'm gonna give myself two weeks to finish up the textures, and go release it. Click for PBR version in marmoset viewer: [url]https://skins.thanez.net/357/marmoset/[/url]
[img]https://skins.thanez.net/357/p11_1.jpg[/img] [img]https://skins.thanez.net/357/p11_4.jpg[/img] [img]https://skins.thanez.net/357/p11_5.jpg[/img] [img]https://skins.thanez.net/357/p11_6.jpg[/img] [img]https://skins.thanez.net/357/p12.jpg[/img]

item.title: I'm gonna need about tree fiddy.

item.description:
Yeah, of course metal looks incredible in PBR, but Source is definitely handling it better than I would have expected. Damn good work!

Really like the creases on the speedloader, too. Mmm…
